question: Rash Behari Bose handed over the control of Azad Hind Fauz in which of the following year?
explanation: In the year 1943 (25th August) Rash Behari Bose handed over the control of Azad Hind Fauz at a meeting in Singapore. Azad Hind Fauz was established in Japanese occupied Singapore with immense support of the Empire of Japan during World War II.
